comparisons.same-degree: has the same degree of preference as
home.method-description.main-text: The method is used to find among the set of objects the most acceptable one by certain parameters.
home.question.label: Enter your question. For example: "Which Italian supercar is better?"
home.description.label: Enter a description of the solution. For example: "Solution of one authoritative auto journalist"
home.objects.names.label: Enter the names of the objects you want to compare.
home.parameters.names.label: Enter the names of the parameters by which you want to compare the objects.
home.objects.comparisons.label: Compare objects by parameter
home.parameters.comparisons.label: Compare parameters
home.list-of-comparisons.title: List of comparisons
home.comparison-matrix.title: Comparison matrix
home.result-priority-table.label: Result priority table
home.consistency-ratio-table.label: Consistency ratio
